# pd-dropdown

## Usage

```html
<pd-dropdown>
    <pd-dropdown-item>item 1</pd-dropdown-item>
    <pd-dropdown-item>item 1</pd-dropdown-item>
    <pd-dropdown-item>item 1</pd-dropdown-item>
</pd-dropdown>
```
